channel.title: Items on Dread's Skyrim Build
channel.description: Recent content in Items on Dread's Skyrim Build

item.title: Armor, Clothing & Accessories
item.description: Bandolier - Bags and Pouches Classic Get the mod Black Sacrament Armor Get the mod Install Black Sacrament Armour - SSE CBBE BodySlide and Black Sacrament Armour - ESL version. Delete the file BlackSacramentArmor.esp (keep BlackSacramentArmor.esl). Some optional tweaks are available in this guides patches to make this armor less overpowered. Even so, it is still possible to combine armor pieces in a way that should be considered cheating since it applies armor rating twice, for example using a barette, a hood and a cowl.

item.title: Weapons
item.description: Animated Armoury - New Weapons with animations SSE Version Get the mod Download and install the optional file Animated Armoury - Plugin Levled List Version and the update file. After installation, delete NewArmoury.bsa and NewArmoury.bsl. Artifacts - The Tournament of the ten Bloods Get the mod Install the main file and the hotfix. In the installer, 2K is recommended. Faction Crossbows SE Get the mod Heavy Armory - New Weapons Get the mod Oblivion Artifact Pack SE Get the mod Royal Armory - New Artifacts Get the mod Ruin’s Edge Get the mod The Staff Of Sheogorath Get the mod Unique Uniques SE Get the mod Install main file
